comments:
Using the first 1.5.1 weekly build, I tried to open web.xml in a Web project by double-clicking on it. The editor failed to open and the following error appeared. Closing and reopening caused the editor to work.

Looks like duplicate of bug 141013.  Did you doubleclick in the Project Explorer in the J2EE perspective?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 141013 ***
No, I was double-clicking in the resource Navigator.
